Why We’re Here

In November 2010, the Moon Viewer was presented at the annual STANYS conference in Rochester, NY where there was an overwhelmingly positive response to the device. Big Cat Science was founded by Myles Frechette, the inventor of the Moon Viewer, in order to make his innovative tool available to teachers everywhere.

Myles, Founder and Inventor

Myles has been teaching science for 30 years at the Middle School, High School and Community College levels. He currently teaches New York State Regents Earth Science and Non-Regents Physics at Beekmantown Central School. Myles is also a Technology Teacher Consultant for PASCO, a manufacturer of scientific probe ware and has written numerous curriculum projects and authored Beekmantown’s first District Technology Plan. He lives in Plattsburgh, NY with his wife and three children where he enjoys boating, skiing, hiking, cycling, camping and spending time with friends and family.
